subject: URGENT: Verify your account
body: Dear customer, we noticed suspicious activity. Click http://yourbank.verify-account.com to verify immediately.
clues: Sender domain is not the official bank domain
Link uses a subdomain that looks suspicious
Urgent language pressuring you to click

subject: New sign-in to your GitHub account
body: We detected a new sign-in from London. If this was you, ignore. If not, secure your account here: https://github.com/settings/security

subject: Your account will be locked
body: Click https://paypalsecure-login.com/verify to prevent account suspension.
clues: Domain is not PayPal's official domain

subject: Top stories today
body: Here are today's top news stories. Read more on https://www.bbc.co.uk/news
clues: Informative content with no urgent links

subject: Your Apple ID has been compromised
body: Verify your account here: http://appleid.verify-account.com immediately.
clues: Link domain does not match official Apple domain
Sender looks slightly different from real Apple email

subject: You have new connection requests
body: View your new connection requests at https://www.linkedin.com/mynetwork/
clues: No suspicious links or urgent language

subject: Your account has been suspended
body: Click https://netflix-login.com/verify to reactivate your account.

subject: New login detected
body: We detected a new login. If it wasnâ€™t you, secure your account: https://twitter.com/settings/security

subject: Verify your online banking
body: Click https://chasebank-verify.com/login to avoid account closure.

subject: Your order has shipped
body: Your order #12345 has shipped. Track it here: https://www.amazon.com/trackorder

subject: Payment failed
body: Your payment failed. Click https://spotify-secure.com/payment to resolve immediately.

subject: New device signed in
body: A new device signed in to your account. If this was not you, review your activity: https://www.dropbox.com/account/security

subject: Immediate action required
body: Click https://microsoft-verify.com/login to secure your account immediately.

subject: New workspace invite
body: You have been invited to join a Slack workspace: https://slack.com/invite

subject: Account verification required
body: Verify your account now: http://bankofamerica-login.com/verify

subject: Your course starts today
body: Welcome! Your course on Python begins today. Access here: https://www.coursera.org/learn/python

subject: Suspicious login detected
body: Click https://paypal-security.com/verify to secure your account.

subject: Booking confirmed
body: Your booking at The Grand Hotel is confirmed. View details: https://www.airbnb.com/booking

subject: Verify your account
body: Click http://linkedin-login.com/verify-account to avoid restrictions.

subject: Meeting scheduled
body: Your meeting with Team Alpha is scheduled. Join at: https://zoom.us/j/123456789

subject: Important security alert
body: Click https://chasebank-secure.com/verify to secure your account immediately.

subject: Your order has shipped
body: Track your order here: https://www.etsy.com/your/orders

subject: Your account will be suspended
body: Click https://netflix-secure-login.com/verify to avoid suspension.

subject: New lesson available
body: A new lesson in Algebra is available: https://www.khanacademy.org/math/algebra

subject: Verify your Apple ID
body: Click http://apple-login.com/verify to avoid account suspension.

subject: Shared file notification
body: You have been granted access to a new file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/abcdefg

subject: Account verification required
body: Click http://paypal-login.com/verify-account to secure your account.

subject: Meeting reminder
body: Your meeting starts at 3 PM. Join here: https://zoom.us/j/987654321

subject: Immediate action required
body: Click https://microsoft-login.com/verify to secure your account immediately.

subject: New course recommendation
body: We recommend a new Python course: https://www.udemy.com/course/python
